description: An hpicfUsrAuthCLIPasswd notification signifies that
CLI password authentication has failed.
Operational control of this notification is provided
using hpicfUsrAuthCliNotifyEnable.

event.Summary: CLI password authentication failed on interface $v2

description: The count of hpicfUsrAuthPasswdFail notifications sent by the hpicfUsrAuth
entity to the SNMP entity. The actual count of notifications sent by SNMP
may be lower due to rate limiting or configuration.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthCLIFailCnt

description: Denotes the interface that is generating the notification.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthCLIInterface

description: An hpicfUsrAuthPasswdChng notification signifies that
the manager password has been changed. The value of
hpicfUsrAuthCLIPasswdSet can be used to determine
whether the password has been set or cleared by this action.
Indicates whether the CLI manager password
is set. 1 indicates True while 2
indicates False.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthCLIPasswdSet

description: A count of CLI password change notifications
sent from the Auth entity to the SNMP entity
within the switch. This count may therefore differ from
the count of notifications actually sent by the SNMP
entity due to switch configuration (e.g., the value
of hpicfUsrAuthNotifyEnable.)
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthCLIPwdNotifyCnt

description: This notification indicates a failed Port Security
(network access) authentication event.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfPortSecAuthFailure HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailCnt u 9999 HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailVlan i 9999 HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailPort i 9999 HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailMAC s EXAMPL

description: The count of hpicfPortSecAuthFailure notifications sent by the hpicfUsrAuth
entity to the SNMP entity. The actual count of notifications sent by SNMP
may be lower due to rate limiting or configuration.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailCnt

description: The VLAN ID associated with the failed authentication request.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailVlan

description: The port index of the failed authentication request.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailPort

description: The MAC address supplied in the failed authentication request.
variables.name: HP-USER-AUTH::hpicfUsrAuthWMAFailMAC
